directions: Gather 50 kilograms of steel to build the mill components
Acquire an electric motor for powering the mill
Install and assemble the steel components and electric motor to create the grain mill
Obtain 200 kilograms of grains such as wheat, corn, etc.
Feed the grains into the mill and operate it using the electric motor
Allow the mill to grind the grains until they reach the desired consistency
Collect the freshly milled flour and store it for later use
